alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 10:55AM EDT until October 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding expected near the time of high tide. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/01 PM 10.7 1.9 0.7 3 None 31/02 AM 9.1 0.3 0.3 3 None 31/02 PM 10.0 1.2 0.3 2 None 01/03 AM 8.6 -0.2 0.3 1 None 01/02 PM 9.7 0.9 0.5 2 None 02/03 AM 8.4 -0.4 0.4 2 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/01 PM 11.0 1.5 1.1 1-2 Minor 31/02 AM 9.0 -0.5 0.3 1-2 None 31/02 PM 9.9 0.4 0.3 1 None 01/03 AM 8.6 -0.9 0.4 1 None 01/03 PM 9.6 0.1 0.5 1 None 02/03 AM 8.3 -1.2 0.4 1 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/01 PM 12.0 2.3 1.0 1-2 Minor 31/01 AM 10.0 0.3 0.2 2 None 31/01 PM 10.9 1.2 0.2 1 None 01/02 AM 9.6 -0.1 0.2 1 None 01/02 PM 10.7 1.0 0.4 1 None 02/03 AM 9.2 -0.5 0.3 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
